  • Method Details

    • isCustomerExists

      public int isCustomerExists(String email, String password) throws CustomerException
      Checks if a customer exists in the database based on the provided email and password.

      This method queries the `customers` table to find a record matching the provided email and password. If a matching record is found, it returns the customer's ID. If no matching record is found, it returns 0.

      Specified by:
      isCustomerExists in interface CustomersDAO
      Parameters:
      email - The email of the customer to check.
      password - The password of the customer to check.
      Returns:
      The ID of the customer if a match is found, or 0 if no match is found.
      Throws:
      CustomerException - If an error occurs while querying the database.

    • addCustomer

      public void addCustomer(Customer customer) throws CustomerException
      Adds a new customer to the database.

      This method inserts a new customer record into the `customers` table using the provided customer information. The `insert_date` field is automatically set to the current time. If the insertion fails, a `CustomerException` is thrown.

      Specified by:
      addCustomer in interface CustomersDAO
      Parameters:
      customer - The customer object containing the details to be added to the database.
      Throws:
      CustomerException - If an error occurs while adding the customer to the database.

    • updateCustomer

      public void updateCustomer(Customer customer) throws CustomerException
      Updates an existing customer record in the database.

      This method updates the details of an existing customer in the `customers` table using the provided customer information. The `id` of the customer is used to identify which record to update. If the update operation fails, a `CustomerException` is thrown.

      Specified by:
      updateCustomer in interface CustomersDAO
      Parameters:
      customer - The customer object containing the updated details to be applied to the database record.
      Throws:
      CustomerException - If an error occurs while updating the customer record in the database.

    • deleteCustomer

      public void deleteCustomer(int customerID) throws CustomerException
      Deletes a customer record from the database based on the customer ID.

      This method removes the customer record from the `customers` table using the provided customer ID. If the deletion operation fails, a `CustomerException` is thrown.

      Specified by:
      deleteCustomer in interface CustomersDAO
      Parameters:
      customerID - The ID of the customer to be deleted from the database.
      Throws:
      CustomerException - If an error occurs while deleting the customer record from the database.

    • getAllCustomers

      public ArrayList<Customer> getAllCustomers() throws CustomerException
      Retrieves all customer records from the database.

      This method executes a query to fetch all records from the `customers` table. Each record is converted to a `Customer` object and added to an `ArrayList`, which is then returned. If an error occurs while retrieving the records, a `CustomerException` is thrown.

      Specified by:
      getAllCustomers in interface CustomersDAO
      Returns:
      An `ArrayList` containing all `Customer` objects retrieved from the database.
      Throws:
      CustomerException - If an error occurs while accessing the database or retrieving the customer records.

    • getSelectedCustomer

      public Customer getSelectedCustomer(int customerID) throws CustomerException
      Retrieves a specific customer record from the database based on the provided customer ID.

      This method executes a query to fetch a record from the `customers` table where the `id` matches the provided `customerID`. If a matching record is found, it is converted to a `Customer` object and returned. If no record is found, a `CustomerException` is thrown.

      Specified by:
      getSelectedCustomer in interface CustomersDAO
      Parameters:
      customerID - The ID of the customer to be retrieved.
      Returns:
      The `Customer` object corresponding to the provided ID.
      Throws:
      CustomerException - If an error occurs while accessing the database or if no customer is found with the provided ID.

    • getAllCouponsByCustomer

      private ArrayList<Coupon> getAllCouponsByCustomer(int customerID) throws CustomerException
      Retrieves all coupons associated with a specific customer from the database.

      This method executes a query to fetch all coupons that have been purchased by the customer with the given `customerID`. It performs a join between the `customers_vs_coupons` and `coupons` tables to get the relevant coupon details. The retrieved coupons are then converted to `Coupon` objects and added to an `ArrayList`, which is returned to the caller.

      Parameters:
      customerID - The ID of the customer whose coupons are to be retrieved.
      Returns:
      An `ArrayList` of `Coupon` objects associated with the specified customer.
      Throws:
      CustomerException - If an error occurs while accessing the database.

    • isCustomerExists

      public boolean isCustomerExists(String email) throws CustomerException
      Checks if a customer with the specified email address exists in the database.

      This method executes a query to search for a customer record that matches the given email address. If a record is found, the method returns `true`, indicating that a customer with that email exists. If no record is found, it returns `false`.

      Parameters:
      email - The email address of the customer to check.
      Returns:
      `true` if a customer with the specified email exists, otherwise `false`.
      Throws:
      CustomerException - If an error occurs while accessing the database.

    • getSelectedCustomer

      public Customer getSelectedCustomer(String email, String password) throws CustomerException
      Retrieves a customer record from the database based on the provided email and password.

      This method performs a query to find a customer whose email and password match the provided values. If a matching customer is found, the method returns a `Customer` object representing that customer. If no matching customer is found, it throws a `CustomerException`.

      Parameters:
      email - The email address of the customer to retrieve.
      password - The password of the customer to retrieve.
      Returns:
      A `Customer` object representing the customer with the specified email and password.
      Throws:
      CustomerException - If an error occurs while accessing the database or if no customer is found with the given email and password.

    • customerToStatement

      public void customerToStatement(Customer customer, PreparedStatement statement) throws SQLException
      Sets the parameters of a `PreparedStatement` using the values from a `Customer` object.

      This method populates the `PreparedStatement` with values from the provided `Customer` object. The order and type of parameters are based on the expected SQL query. If the `Customer` object has a positive ID, it is set as the last parameter in the statement.

      Parameters:
      customer - The `Customer` object whose values will be used to populate the `PreparedStatement`.
      statement - The `PreparedStatement` to be populated with customer data.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If an SQL error occurs while setting the parameters.

    • resultSetToCustomer

      public Customer resultSetToCustomer(ResultSet resultSet) throws SQLException, CustomerException
      Converts a `ResultSet` into a `Customer` object.

      This method extracts customer data from the given `ResultSet` and constructs a `Customer` object. It also retrieves the list of coupons associated with the customer using their ID.

      Parameters:
      resultSet - The `ResultSet` containing customer data.
      Returns:
      A `Customer` object populated with the data from the `ResultSet`.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If an SQL error occurs while retrieving data from the `ResultSet`.
      CustomerException - If an error occurs while retrieving the customer's coupons.
